name: cvirio
description: An idea of how to make a CV a little less boring

scripts.build: rm -rf './dist' && mkdir -p 'dist/js/' && npx browserify './src/main.js' -o 'dist/js/script.js' && npx uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output 'dist/js/script.min.js' -- 'dist/js/script.js' && cp -RT public/ dist/

author: banach.krystian@gmail.com
